com.jdbwc.util
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  com.jdbwc.util.Constants

public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object

Comment from the author: Represents various constants used in the driver.

Note from Tim: PS: Many thanks to the mySql team for making the Connector-J sources available to developers.
Many more thanks to Mark Matthews for writting this class file.
This file remains unchanged from the original with the exception of this additional commentry and GPL license upgrade from version 2 to version 3.
This file has had the GPL version 3 license applied to achieve OSI compliance for the JDBWC package prior to distribution and is not intended to claim any credit for the contents of this file, which remains with MySQL AB.
